document_title: Pubic lice: Causes, signs, treatment, prevention
subsection_name: benh-ran-mu.json_4_Risk factors increase the likelihood of infection
subsection_content:
Risk factors that increase the likelihood of getting pubic lice include:
Having sex with someone who has pubic lice; Have many different sexual partners.; Sharing clothes, towels, and bed sheets.
Subjects are likely to be infected
Anyone can be infected with pubic lice. This disease is most common in adolescents and adults. However, children and older adults are still at risk of getting pubic lice.
